title: BRIEF-Inox Wind Ltd Signs Additional Deal For SECI 50 MW Capacity With Adani Green Energy
text:
BRIEF-Inox Wind Ltd Signs Additional Deal For SECI 50 MW Capacity With Adani Green Energy

Stock Markets 46 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 08:42)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Inox Wind Ltd Signs Additional Deal For SECI 50 MW Capacity With Adani Green Energy Oct 16 (Reuters) - Inox Wind Ltd : * SAYS HAS SIGNED AN ADDITIONAL DEAL FOR SECI 50 MW CAPACITY WITH ADANI GREEN ENERGY * PROJECT COMPRISES OF 25 NOS. OF ITS LATEST 2 MW WIND TURBINES

BRIEF-Inox Wind Ltd Signs Additional Deal For SECI 50 MW Capacity With Adani Green Energy
description: BRIEF-Inox Wind Ltd Signs Additional Deal For SECI 50 MW Capacity With Adani Green Energy
